text: Hércules C.F. is a football club which plays in Spain. Founded in 25 October 1922, it currently plays in Segunda División RFEF – Group 5 and plays its home games at the 29,500 members Estadio José Rico Pérez. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Segunda División B 11th / Group 3 2001/02 Segunda División B 3rd / Group 3 2002/03 Segunda División B 11th / Group 3 2003/04 Segunda División B 9th / Group 3 2004/05 Segunda División B 2th / Group 3 2005/06 Segunda División 17th 2006/07 Segunda División 16th 2007/08 Segunda División 6th 2008/09 Segunda División 4th === Former position === ==References== Category:1922 establishments in Spain Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Alicante
title: Hércules CF
